鍾意聽 the libertines, alex turner, the kills, feist, edward sharpe & the magnetic zeros, sufjan stevens, damien rice, arcade fire, jack garratt, keaton henson, james bay, lorde, milky chance, the morning benders (pop etc.), radical face

如果你識任何樂器又啱music taste pwease pm meeeeeeeeeeeee
